/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the road, there are trees and bushes, adding a touch of greenery to the scene. A white car is visible on the road, moving towards the right side of the image. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, following the path of the highway. The image is bathed in the light of the sun, which shines brightly in the top left corner, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the scene.
